scripts.test: cd libs/signal && npm run test && cd ../signal-clock && npm run test
scripts.pub1: npm run ver:dev && cd libs/signal && npm publish
scripts.pub3: cd libs/signal-dom && npm publish && cd ../signal-clock && npm publish
scripts.pub4: cd libs/jsx-runtime && npm publish && cd ../jsx-dev-runtime && npm publish
scripts.pub: npm run pub1 && npm run pub2 && npm run pub3 && npm run pub4
